item.description:
Hi, did you enjoy the Murder Mystery party well then you probably would like the idea of Cabaret with a twist? Especially with Halloween approaching? We will be attending the show at the Governors Inn

You'll love this outrageously entertain evening of gallows humor, song and dance. This is the show that would result if the Addams Family and the Munsters decided to do a musical review! It provides an outrageous look at the morbid and macabre.
Thus Macab aret.

The Cast of Corpses includes Phil Graves, Helena Handbasket, Maude Lynn and Paul Bearer, with songs entitled: Grave Mistake, Dead End Job, Boogie Woogie Boogie Man. RIP...you get the picture. Macabaret is fiendishly fun entertainment!

Tickets: Only $30 including 4-course dinner, tax & gratuity!

Please call: "The Governors Inn" at 603-332-0107 for reservations, mention that you want to sit in the Trailblazers reserved seating area! You can get more info about the Governors Inn at: www.governorsinn.com

We will be joined by the Traillazers Meetup group.

This show will sell out quickly please RSVP with them as soon as possible.

See you there!

Peter
item.name: "MACABARET" A HALLOWEEN DINNER SHOW SPOOKTACULAR !!!
